title: 7 Easy Break-Up Spells (& How to Cast Them)

steps.title: Cut a deep cross into a fresh lemon.
steps.content: Cut a deep cross into a fresh lemon. Make the cuts perpendicular to each other on one side of the lemon. Don’t cut all the way through the lemon. [1] X Research source If you accidentally cut the lemon completely in half, start with a new lemon. Choose the Lemon Break-up Spell to break up a dangerous and toxic relationship quickly.

steps.title: Write the names of the couple on separate slips of paper.
steps.content: Write the names of the couple on separate slips of paper. Make the pieces small enough to be folded to fit inside the lemon but large enough to write a first and last name. Use black ink to write both full names, with one name on each piece of paper.

steps.title: Fold the slips of paper and stuff them into the slits of the lemon.
steps.content: Fold the slips of paper and stuff them into the slits of the lemon. Fold the paper away from you to keep the spell from coming back at you. Place each piece of paper into a different slit. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put the lemon into a small container with salt, pepper, and vinegar.
steps.content: Put the lemon into a small container with salt, pepper, and vinegar. After placing the folded pieces of paper inside the lemon, place it in a small, freezable container. Then, sprinkle salt, black pepper, and vinegar over the lemon. The salt makes the couple “salty” with each other, the pepper kindles anger, and the vinegar sours their relationship.

steps.title: Seal the spell with black candle wax.
steps.content: Seal the spell with black candle wax. Light a black candle and drip the melted wax into the cuts on the lemon to seal the spell. Extinguish the candle and close the container.

steps.title: Freeze the lemon for one week then throw it into running water.
steps.content: Freeze the lemon for one week then throw it into running water. After closing the container, place it in your freezer to make the couple cold and distant with each other. After a week, dispose of the lemon by throwing it into running water, such as a river or stream. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Use rock salt to make a circle around a slip of white paper.
steps.content: Use rock salt to make a circle around a slip of white paper. Place a piece of white paper measuring at least 3” x 5” on a clean, flat surface, such as a table or altar. Sprinkle rock salt in a circle around the paper, ensuring there are no gaps. [4] X Research source This spell is very easy to perform with powerful results, sometimes separating a couple in as little as 24 hours. Use the Break Up Forever Spell when you want permanent results using ingredients you have around your home.

steps.title: Write the couple's names on the paper and then circle them.
steps.content: Write the couple's names on the paper and then circle them. Use a pen to write the names of both members of the couple, and then make a circle around their names with black ink. [5] X Research source Don’t remove the paper from the salt circle or make gaps as you write.

steps.title: Cross out the names with an X and sprinkle the paper with chili powder.
steps.content: Cross out the names with an X and sprinkle the paper with chili powder. Make a large X across the names and the circle on the paper using your black pen. Sprinkle chili powder on the paper until you can no longer see the names. [6] X Research source Crossing out the names symbolizes an end to the relationship. Chili powder signifies anger and arguments.

steps.title: Lock the spell with red candle wax and say, “Break up forever.”
steps.content: Lock the spell with red candle wax and say, “Break up forever.” Light a red candle and drip the wax onto the paper and chili powder. Fill the entire circle with candle wax, covering as much chili powder as possible to seal the anger into the relationship. [7] X Research source When the chili powder and circle underneath are covered with wax, firmly say, “Break up forever,” to finish the spell.

steps.title: Write the names of the couple on two pieces of paper.
steps.content: Write the names of the couple on two pieces of paper. Fold the pieces of paper in half. Make sure to fold away from you to send the energy into the universe instead of at yourself. Fold photographs of each person with their names if you have them. Or, tear a photo of the couple in half and fold each half with the pieces of paper.

steps.title: Place ingredients symbolizing anger, fighting, and sour feelings in a jar.
steps.content: Place ingredients symbolizing anger, fighting, and sour feelings in a jar. Add pins, needles, chili powder, salt, and nails, which symbolize sharp or angry feelings. Include a few hairs from both a black cat and a black dog to cause the couple to “fight like cats and dogs.” [8] X Research source Pour vinegar into the jar to sour the couple’s feelings for each other.

steps.title: Seal the bottle and throw it into the center of a crossroads.
steps.content: Seal the bottle and throw it into the center of a crossroads. Make sure the bottle is airtight so the ingredients don’t leak out. Take the bottle to a crossroads or place where two roads cross, making an intersection, and throw it into the center to symbolize the couple moving away from each other. This spell is easy and effective but can take up to 3 days to work. Use the Vinegar Break-Up Spell for more dramatic breakups, where the couple ends the relationship after an argument.

steps.title: Focus your intentions and light a black candle at midnight.
steps.content: Focus your intentions and light a black candle at midnight. Think about the couple you want to break up, picturing them walking away from each other. As you’re thinking, light a black candle. It’s best to begin this spell at midnight. [9] X Research source Use a black candle for endings and breaking bad habits. [10] X Research source This spell only requires a candle and a pin and takes a few moments to complete. Generally, candle spells involving love or relationships can take about 2 weeks to manifest, but timing is variable. [11] X Research source Visualization is important for this spell, so only use it when you have a quiet place and plenty of time to focus on picturing the breakup.

steps.title: Prick the candle with a pin while chanting your spell.
steps.content: Prick the candle with a pin while chanting your spell. Use a pin to prick the candle as many times as you can as you chant the spell. Write your own spell or use, “As I prick this candle, I prick at thee. Broken hearts unhappy be. May you part another day, soon to go your separate ways.” [12] X Research source

steps.title: Extinguish the candle and break it in two.
steps.content: Extinguish the candle and break it in two. Put out the candle using your fingers or a candle snuffer. Visualize the couple splitting up as you break the candle in half. When you dispose of the candle, put the pieces in separate places to further symbolize how the couple will be apart.

steps.title: Light a black candle and write the couple's names on a piece of paper.
steps.content: Light a black candle and write the couple's names on a piece of paper. Use black ink to write the full names of both people. Add their birthdates if you have them, but it’s not required. Draw a circle around the names. This spell is more advanced because it requires chanting and visualization to focus the energy. It can take up to 2 weeks to take effect, so use it when you aren’t in a hurry to break a couple up. You can also use a black separation candle . This type of candle depicts a man and a woman facing away from each other.

steps.title: Drip melted wax from the candle onto the names.
steps.content: Drip melted wax from the candle onto the names. Hold the candle over the piece of paper. Carefully tip it until melted wax drips onto the paper inside the circle you drew. Drip wax onto the paper until the circle and its contents are covered. [13] X Research source As you drip the wax, visualize the couple breaking up.

steps.title: Chant the spell and blow out the candle.
steps.content: Chant the spell and blow out the candle. Blow out the candle after you finish covering the circle on your paper with black wax. Then, say: “So I transferred my will. My spell has been heard. So I want it, so be it!” [14] X Research source If you prefer to write your own chant, go right ahead. The specific wording is less important than your intention.

steps.title: Relight the candle and use it to burn the paper.
steps.content: Relight the candle and use it to burn the paper. Light the black candle again and use the flame to burn the paper. Let the candle burn until it goes out. Safely burn the paper in a fireplace or an outdoor fire pit. Do not let the candle burn unattended.

steps.title: Write the names of the friends you want to break up on paper.
steps.content: Write the names of the friends you want to break up on paper. Write both full names on one sheet of paper as “Person 1 + Person 2” 8 times. Then, write the first person’s name 8 times on a second piece of paper. On a third piece of paper, write the second person’s name. Roll the three pieces of paper separately and set them aside to use later. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Mix water, lemon juice, and soy sauce in a bowl.
steps.content: Mix water, lemon juice, and soy sauce in a bowl. Fill a bottle or small jar half full with water and pour it into the bowl. Add 10 drops of lemon juice and stir. Pour one drop of dark soy sauce into the bowl. The water stands for clarity, the lemon juice for bitterness, and the soy sauce for darkness. [16] X Research source Choose a jar or bottle with an airtight lid.

steps.title: Add salt, sodium bicarbonate, chili powder, mustard seeds, and cloves.
steps.content: Add salt, sodium bicarbonate, chili powder, mustard seeds, and cloves. Measure out 3 tablespoons of salt. Add it to the bowl with a pinch of sodium bicarbonate and stir. Sprinkle in a pinch of chili powder and a few mustard seeds and cloves. Then, stir the mixture again. [17] X Research source Add more dark soy sauce or black food coloring for a darker potion.

steps.title: Pour the potion into the bottle and add the pieces of rolled paper.
steps.content: Pour the potion into the bottle and add the pieces of rolled paper. Once you’ve poured the potion into the bottle or jar, add the three pieces of rolled paper you set aside earlier. Fill the bottle to the brim with water, then screw the lid on tightly.

steps.title: Shake the bottle 3 times, chanting your spell.
steps.content: Shake the bottle 3 times, chanting your spell. “Coming night, please hear my plight. Bring darkness and drown friendship’s light. Blind the eyes of (Person 1) and (Person 2). Let them not be friends again. Let all ties break and end. So mote it be.” [18] X Research source When pouring into a bottle, use a funnel to pour the potion without spilling.

steps.title: Keep the potion near your bed and repeat the chant nightly.
steps.content: Keep the potion near your bed and repeat the chant nightly. Repeat the magical chant while gently shaking the bottle three times every night. When the paper in the bottle dissolves, your spell is done. [19] X Research source This spell is beginner-friendly, but it can take some time to be effective. The Spell to Break Up a Friendship is most effective when used to break up friends, but it can also be effective to separate a couple that remains friends after a breakup. Once the spell is done, pour out the liquid in a secluded spot away from your home. Either recycle the bottle or clean and reuse it in a different spell.

steps.title: Light pink and white candles with a photo of the person between them.
steps.content: Light pink and white candles with a photo of the person between them. Light 1 white candle and 1 pink candle. Place a photograph of the person under a love spell between the 2 candles. [20] X Research source If you don’t have a photo, write the person’s full name on paper and place it between the candles. Use this simple candle spell to break a love spell you believe has been placed on another person. It’s easy to perform and sometimes works right away.

steps.title: Hold rose petals while chanting the spell.
steps.content: Hold rose petals while chanting the spell. Hold a handful of rose petals in your palm. Chant: “I release you, [person’s name], from your burden.” Repeat the chant 3 times, and then say, “So mote it be.” [21] X Research source Use fresh rose petals if possible, but dried petals also work.

steps.title: Put the rose petals into a jar and place it next to your bed.
steps.content: Put the rose petals into a jar and place it next to your bed. Keep the jar near your bed until the person is free of the spell. When you see the jar, take a moment to imagine the person happy and free of the spell. [22] X Research source Extinguish the candles or let them burn down for an extra power boost. Do not leave candles burning unattended. Once the object of the spell is free, bury the rose petals outside your home.

steps.title: Do break-up spells actually work?
steps.content: Do break-up spells actually work? Some people strongly believe that break-up spells are a powerful and effective form of magic that requires proper preparation and clear intention. However, they don’t believe that spells of any kind are guaranteed. Even when you properly prepare your spell, follow all of the steps, and have the proper intention, the outcome you desire may not happen because it’s simply not meant to be or the timing isn’t right. [23] X Research source

steps.title: Are break-up spells a bad idea?
steps.content: Are break-up spells a bad idea? It depends on your intention. If you’re casting a spell to break up a couple that is truly in love for selfish or vengeful reasons, it may not work. And some believe the negative energy you put out will come back on you threefold, meaning it’s 3 times as bad for you as what you originally intended for the other person. [24] X Research source Cast your break-up spells with pure intentions, making sure to leave room for free will and the best outcome for everyone involved.

steps.title: What’s the best day to perform break-up spells?
steps.content: What’s the best day to perform break-up spells? Many believe Saturday is a good day to perform a break-up spell because it’s associated with the planet Saturn. Saturn represents boundaries, limitations, and separation. Tuesday is another good day for break-up spells. It’s associated with the planet Mars which represents conflict, aggression, and war. [25] X Research source Use Mars' energy to evoke combativeness, but be careful. It’s also associated with violence, danger, and cruelty. Time your spell at dusk or midnight during a waning moon for the best results. [26] X Research source

steps.title: Do break-up spells weaken over time?
steps.content: Do break-up spells weaken over time? It’s possible a break-up spell will weaken over time. Even the most powerful break-up spell can become less powerful against a couple with deep emotional bonds. The spell might cause conflict, but it can’t take away the bonds they share. [27] X Research source A break-up spell that interferes with someone else’s relationship without their consent is not ethical and may be hard to maintain.

steps.title: Do break-up spells work as well as binding love spells?
steps.content: Do break-up spells work as well as binding love spells? There’s no straightforward answer for whether break-up spells work better than binding love spells. It depends on who is casting the spell, what their intention is, and whether they have faith in their ability to change reality. It can also depend on the type of spell they use. For example, a white magick break-up spell with a focus on the best outcome for everyone involved may have a more positive result than a black magick spell that seeks to bend the will of another. [28] X Research source There are two main types of binding spells. The first binds two people together magically and spiritually as in a handfasting ceremony. The other binds a person to prevent them from doing something. Most famously, the New Forest Coven of Great Britain led by Gerald Gardner cast a spell to bind Hitler and prevent him from invading England during WWII. [29] X Research source

steps.title: Is it possible to resist break-up spells?
steps.content: Is it possible to resist break-up spells? Yes, a person’s free will is extremely powerful. Even if the spell is initially successful, it may not be able to continue to manipulate a person who hasn’t consented to the spell. Plus, if they’re aware that a spell has been cast on them, they can take steps to remove , reverse , or break it. [30] X Research source A break-up spell is a type of love spell because it interferes with a person’s love life.
